headline: GTA Online
subtitle: P-45 Nokota
content: Sure, you could follow the crowd with their hypermodern fighter jets and computer guidance systems – but you crave something more authentic. The P-45 Nokota comes fast and low straight out of a time when the planes were beautiful, the guns were loud and the enemy were straight ahead. If you’re after a slice of 40’s fighter ace chic, look no further.
